flavor_text_entries.diamond:
A Pokémon that lives by water.
It moves quickly on land by
bouncing on its big tail.
flavor_text_entries.ruby:
AZURILL spins its tail as if it were a
lasso, then hurls it far. The momentum
of the throw sends its body flying, too. Using this unique action, one of these
POKéMON managed to hurl itself a record
33 feet.
flavor_text_entries.sapphire:
AZURILL’s tail is large and bouncy.
It is packed full of the nutrients this
POKéMON needs to grow. AZURILL can be seen bouncing and
playing on its big, rubbery tail.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Its tail, which is packed with nutrition,
is very bouncy like a rubber ball. On sunny
days they gather at the edge of water and
splash about for fun.
flavor_text_entries.firered:
It battles by flinging around its tail,
which is bigger than its body. The
tail is a flotation device in water.
flavor_text_entries.leafgreen:
It battles by flinging around its tail,
which is bigger than its body. The
tail is a flotation device in water.
flavor_text_entries.pearl:
Its tail is filled with nutrients
necessary for growth. It plays
by bouncing on its tail.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
Its tail bounces like a rubber ball.
It flings that tail around to fight
opponents bigger than itself.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold:
Its tail is packed full of the
nutrients it needs to grow.
flavor_text_entries.soulsilver:
Its tail is packed full of the
nutrients it needs to grow.
flavor_text_entries.black:
Its tail bounces like a rubber ball.
It flings that tail around to fight

flavor_text_entries.white:
Its tail bounces like a rubber ball.
It flings that tail around to fight

flavor_text_entries.black-2:
It swings its large, nutrient-filled
tail around to fight opponents
bigger than itself.
flavor_text_entries.white-2:
It swings its large, nutrient-filled

flavor_text_entries.x:
A Pokémon that lives by water. It moves quickly on
land by bouncing on its big tail.
flavor_text_entries.y:
It swings its large, nutrient-filled tail around to fight
opponents bigger than itself.
flavor_text_entries.omega-ruby:
Azurill spins its tail as if it were a lasso, then hurls it far.
The momentum of the throw sends its body flying, too.
Using this unique action, one of these Pokémon managed to
hurl itself a record 33 feet.
flavor_text_entries.alpha-sapphire:
Azurill’s tail is large and bouncy. It is packed full of the
nutrients this Pokémon needs to grow. Azurill can be seen
bouncing and playing on its big, rubbery tail.
flavor_text_entries.sword:
The ball on Azurill’s tail bounces like a rubber
ball, and it’s full of the nutrients the Pokémon
needs to grow.
flavor_text_entries.shield:
Although Azurill are normally docile, an angry
one will swing around the big ball on its tail and
try to smash its opponents.
